home.heroDescription: A Full Stack Developer crafting comprehensive web solutions by seamlessly integrating robust Frontend designs with powerful Backends
home.aboutSubHeading: Here you will find more information about me, what I do, and my current skills mostly in terms of programming and technology
home.aboutDescription:
I'm a Full Stack Web Developer skilled in building complete web applications from start to finish. I develop both the front-end and back-end portions of web applications, working with both client-side and server-side technologies.

On the front-end, I create responsive and intuitive user interfaces using HTML, CSS, JavaScript frameworks like React. I implement features that enhance the user experience and ensure cross-browser compatibility and responsiveness for mobile devices.

On the back-end, I develop server, API and database components for functionality, security and data using NestJS and databases such as MySQL and PostgreSQL. I integrate the front-end elements with the back-end through RESTful APIs.

I'm open to Job opportunities where I can contribute, learn and grow. If you have a good opportunity that matches my skills and experience then don't hesitate to contact me.
home.projectsSubHeading: Here you will find some of the personal and clients projects that I created with each project containing its own case study
home.thriftshop-description: A platform e-commerce thrift shop that allows users to open their own online stores and upload used products to sell. There is a store panel for sellers to manage products. Buyers can view and checkout items from various stores.
home.contactSubHeading: Feel free to Contact me by submitting the form below and I will get back to you as soon as possible
